ygData.subject: Re: [RE: [EQ_women] RP Server in Test]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... and ... Well we re going to be playing on Percival, the RP server.  I m not sure what my name will be yet but look for Blade of Enric .  The guild has a
ygData.messageBody:
"Lora Roa" <loraroa@...> wrote:
> Hmmm .. may want to contact you Ice on the server that guild is on after
> release. That is the team my daughter and I want to try. I want to be a
> Saracen - as my husband has historical ties to Moorish culture in Spain >
and
> that got me going on background ideas. That and they have NO elves! ;)

Well we're going to be playing on Percival, the RP server. I'm not sure what
my name will be yet but look for "Blade of Enric". The guild has a cool
policy. Easy to get in but trouble makers will be booted instantly with no
recourse. THe guild leader has total authority. A monarchy :-)

Ice
